== Location ==
== Location ==
â
The company has its headquarters in [[Palo Alto]], [[California]], [[United States]],<ref name=vmw_office_loc>{{Cite web |title=VMware Office Locations |accessdate=2008-03-04 |publisher=VMware, Inc. |url=http://vmware.com/company/office_locations.html}}</ref> with additional offices located in [[Palo Alto, California|Palo Alto]] and [[San Francisco]], California; [[Broomfield, Colorado]]; [[Cambridge, Massachusetts]];<ref>{{Cite web |title=VMware Office Locations - Massachusetts |accessdate=2008-03-04 |publisher=VMware, Inc. |url=http://vmware.com/company/office_massachusetts.html}}</ref> [[London, England|London]], UK; [[Aarhus, Denmark]]; [[Sofia, Bulgaria]]; [[Sydney]]/[[Melbourne]]/[[Brisbane]]/[[Canberra]]/[[Perth]]/[[Adelaide]], [[Australia]]; [[Wellington]]/[[Auckland]], [[New Zealand]]; [[Hong Kong]]; [[Beijing]]/[[Shanghai]], [[China]]; [[Singapore]]; [[Kuala Lumpur]], [[Malaysia]]; [[Taipei]], [[Taiwan]]; [[Bangalore]]/[[Pune]]/[[New Delhi]]/[[Guindy]]/[[Mumbai]], [[India]]; [[Seoul]], [[Korea]]; [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]]; [[Cork (city)|Cork]], [[Ireland]] and [[Toronto|Toronto]], [[Canada.]]
+
The company has its headquarters in [[Palo Alto, California]], [[United States]],<ref name=vmw_office_loc>{{Cite web |title=VMware Office Locations |accessdate=2008-03-04 |publisher=VMware, Inc. |url=http://vmware.com/company/office_locations.html}}</ref> with additional offices located in [[Palo Alto, California|Palo Alto]] and [[San Francisco]], California; [[Broomfield, Colorado]]; [[Cambridge, Massachusetts]];<ref>{{Cite web |title=VMware Office Locations - Massachusetts |accessdate=2008-03-04 |publisher=VMware, Inc. |url=http://vmware.com/company/office_massachusetts.html}}</ref> [[London, England|London]], UK; [[Aarhus, Denmark]]; [[Sofia, Bulgaria]]; [[Sydney]]/[[Melbourne]]/[[Brisbane]]/[[Canberra]]/[[Perth]]/[[Adelaide]], [[Australia]]; [[Wellington]]/[[Auckland]], [[New Zealand]]; [[Hong Kong]]; [[Beijing]]/[[Shanghai]], [[China]]; [[Singapore]]; [[Kuala Lumpur]], [[Malaysia]]; [[Taipei]], [[Taiwan]]; [[Bangalore]]/[[Pune]]/[[New Delhi]]/[[Guindy]]/[[Mumbai]], [[India]]; [[Seoul]], [[Korea]]; [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]]; [[Cork (city)|Cork]], [[Ireland]] and [[Toronto|Toronto]], [[Canada.]]
